Query.name: Advanced Reservation Time Usage
Query.description:
It shows the time usage of the AR. Contains these fields:
- job_duration (the total time of jobs that ran in an AR) NULL value means no jobs ran in this reservation
- ar_duration (the total time that was reserved for AR)
- unused_reserved_time (the total reserved time of an AR that was not used) NULL value means the whole reservation was unused
Query.sql:
select ar_number, DECODE(FLOOR((job_duration)/86400), 0, '', FLOOR((job_duration)/86400) || ' day(s), ') || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOD((trunc(job_duration)), 86400),'SSSSS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS job_duration, DECODE(FLOOR((ar_duration)/86400), 0, '', FLOOR((ar_duration)/86400) || ' day(s), ') || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOD((trunc(ar_duration)), 86400),'SSSSS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS ar_duration, DECODE(FLOOR((ar_duration - job_duration)/86400), 0, '', FLOOR((ar_duration - job_duration)/86400) || ' day(s), ') || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOD((trunc(ar_duration - job_duration)), 86400),'SSSSS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS unused_time
FROM view_ar_time_usage WHERE ar_number IN (SELECT ar_number FROM view_ar_log WHERE event = 'TERMINATED')
